name: CmdrLTStone In Stateroom Aboard USS Lapon

desc.html: Cmdr. Lowell T. Stone seated in the Officer's Stateroom. The "scorecard" and mascot, Laruppin-Lou-Lapon, and fish namesake are featured on the wall. Two watercolor "pin-ups" (artist unknown) hang to the left and right.

wiki.Credit: From the personal collection of Timothy Stone, grandson of Commander L. T. Stone, USS Lapon (SS-260).
